info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 03 at 9:58AM PST until February 03 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts over 40 mph are expected through this afternoon. Choppy waters are expected across Lake Mead and Lake Havasu with 1 to 2 foot waves likely over the open waters. 1 to 3 foot waves are expected across Lake Mohave. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu, Fort Mohave and the Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Laughlin and the Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong wind gusts could lead to minor tree and power line damage resulting in power outages. Isolated structural damage may also result. Choppy waters and enhanced wave action on area lakes will lead to dangerous boating conditions for small craft.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
